I ran into #p2081001# at #m240000000#. #p2081001# seemed concerned by the fact that the egg he's taking care of is about to be hatched, and is constantly moving, in danger of dropping any minute. He wanted to make a supporting block to fully support the egg, and asked me for help. I better start gathering up #b48 #t4000236#s#k and #b28 #t4000237#s#k.

#i4000236##t4000236# #b#c4000236##k / 48
#i4000237##t4000237# #b#c4000237##k / 28
As requested by #p2081001#, I gathered up 48 #t4000236#s and 28 #t4000237#s for him. #p2081001# was concerned about building a sturdy support block for the egg, and has started doing so.
처음보는 얼굴인데? 반가워 난 #p2081001#라고해. 어이쿠! 방금 봤어? 이 알은 내가 돌보고 있는 알인데 부화할때가 거의 다 되어서 이렇게 흔들리는 일이 많아졌어.
아기 용이 태어나는 것은 기쁘지만 너무 많이 흔들리는 바람에 떨어질까봐 걱정이야. 튼튼한 받침대라도 있다면 다행일텐데 말야. 어때? 받침대 만드는 일을 도와주지 않겠어?
네가 재료를 구해다 주면 받침대는 내가 만들도록할게. 나뭇가지로 만들어도 좋겠지만 더 튼튼하게 만들려면 뭐니뭐니해도 #t4000236#이 최고지! #t4000236#은 정말 튼튼하거든. #b#t4000236# 48개#k와 #b#t4000237# 28개#k를 모아와 줘~
보람찬 일이 될텐데... 다시 한번 생각해보는건 어때?

Hello, there. I don't think we've ever met. Anyway, my name is #b#p2081001##k. Oh, you noticed? I've been taking care of this egg for a while, and it's at a point where it may hatch any minute. See this shaking? It means it's ready to hatch any minute.

It'd be great to see the baby dragon hatch out of the egg, but I'm worried about the egg falling because it's moving so much now. I wish I had a nice supporting block here so the egg won't break in case it falls. Would you like to help me make the block?

Okay, now all you need to do now is to gather up the necessary items, and I'll build it. Building it with a bunch of tree branches may work, but in order to build one sturdy support block, I'll need #t4000236#! #t4000236# is rock solid! Please gather up #b48 #t4000236#s#k and #b28 #t4000237#s#k~
This should be a rewarding experience for you ... please reconsider.
Been a while~ HEY, you've got scars all over your body! Obtaining Beetle's Horn must have been quite an ordeal... but anyway, thank you so much for gathering up all the horns that I asked you to get.
I'll now have to start setting up the supporting block. This should keep me busy all day.

#t4000236#, which can be found in the forest somewhere in the East, is known for being sturdier than steel. It's solid on the inside, but soft on the surface, which is perfect for building a supporting block. Did you gather up #b48 #t4000236#s#k and #b28 #t4000237#s#k?
